# file-preview Props

# fileType

  • type: String
  • options: md/img
  • require: true

# mdPvProps

  • type:Object
  • description: work when fileType === 'md', more detail to md-previewer

# imgPvProps

  • type:Object
  • description: work when fileType === 'md', more detail to md-previewer
